item.title: scoop: command-line package manager for Windows
item.description: 1 Do I really need？ 众所周知，在Windows下进行开发多少有点反人类，环境配置和macos/linux相比，可以说是灾难。索性有人开源了一系列包管理工具，主要有scoop/chocolatey/winget。对比之下，选择了 scoop，体验良好，写一文向大家安利。 通过包管理工具，你可以直接在终端中快速自动地安装、配置、卸载和升级软件，而无需通过 GUI 页面一步步手动安装下载软件。这非常适合一次性安装非常多软件，大大地节约了软件安装所需要的时间和步骤，同时也在一定程度上确保了来源软件的安全性。 优点包括不限于：降低安装维护软件的成本，避免安装大量软件造成的路径污染，不必查找和安装软件的其他依赖项，避免捆绑和垃圾软件，卸载彻底。 2 Setup environment scoop init set-executionpolicy remotesigned -scope currentuser iex (new-object net.webclient).downloadstring('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lukesampson/scoop/master/bin/install.ps1') basic apps scoop install 7zip scoop install git scoop install sudo scoop install innounp scoop install dark checkup scoop checkup 3 Search for apps https://scoop-docs.now.sh/apps/ https://rasa.github.io/scoop-directory/by-apps 4 Personal app-list bucket scoop bucket add extras scoop bucket add versions normal # system scoop install geekuninstaller scoop install dismplusplus scoop install listary scoop install everything scoop install motrix scoop install kms # network & proxy scoop install shadowsocks scoop install v2rayn scoop install psiphon3 # daily office scoop install chromium scoop install wpsoffice # multimedia scoop install ditto # CTRL+shift+V scoop install lightshot # CTRL+shift+S scoop install imageglass scoop install mpv development # terminal emulator scoop install windows-terminal # admin scoop install mobaxterm # admin, icon # text editor / IDE scoop install typora # theme: github, night, monokai, misty, purple, fluent, drake scoop install vscode scoop install jetbrains-toolbox # image & text scoop install hugo-extended scoop install pandoc # golang scoop install go # python scoop install miniconda3 development (not suggest to install on windows) # # c/cpp # scoop install gcc # scoop install gdb # # java # scoop bucket add java # scoop install openjdk8-redhat # scoop install maven # # web & other # scoop install nodejs-lts # scoop install nginx # scoop install apache # # database # scoop install mysql # scoop install sqlite # scoop install postgresql # scoop install mongodb # scoop install redis 5 Frequently used commands # get scoop search <app> scoop info <app> # bucket scoop bucket list scoop bucket known scoop bucket add <bucket> <bucket_url> scoop bucket rm <bucket> # install & update scoop install <app> scoop update <app> # uninstall scoop uninstall <app> -p scoop uninstall scoop # check scoop list scoop status scoop checkup # clean scoop cache rm * scoop cleanup *
